name: Sacrilige
description:
A game made under 48 hours for Invictvs Game Jam during 19th-21st November 2021

Theme: "Comeback"

Sacrilige is a 3rd person Hack & Slash Roguelite where the player has to defeat a boss to clear the game.

 Death isn't the end in Scarilige, since our character will respawn each time he gets killed to face the boss again. In order to end this everlasting battle, our frail hero will have to die a lot.

Why? Well, each time the player gets killed he will be allowed to choose an upgrade to help him during the boss fight. These upgrades can range from UI changes to player buffs, making each upgrade choice difficult.
